properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 3:46PM EST until February 21 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...WINTER STORM WILL BRING ACCUMULATING SNOWFALL TO THE AREA
TONIGHT INTO FRIDAY MORNING...

.Sleet and snow will begin to mix in with light to moderate rain
later this afternoon and this evening, gradually transitioning to
all snow by late tonight. Snow will be heavy at times overnight
with the highest snow totals across the northern half of Eastern
NC. Snow will taper off Friday morning, with gusty winds
continuing through the day.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches.

* WHERE...Inland Onslow and Duplin Counties.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for North Carolina can be found online
at DriveNC.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY
